concept: An ancient medieval-style labyrinth, where you can feel the mysterious atmosphere and the oppression and fear of a closed space.
description: The labyrinth, made of medieval-style stone walls, has a pair of torches per block placed on each side of the wall, and narrow passageways branch out into several paths centered around a central altar decorated with skulls, giving it the appearance of a labyrinth.

player_pathfinding.description: The skull altar located in the center of the labyrinth

combat_zones.type: The Center Altar of the Labyrinth

narrative_hints: A building with a mysterious medieval atmosphere
A labyrinthine environment that evokes a sense of mystery
A sense of foreboding as you navigate the twisting passages
An environment and lighting that allows you to feel oppression and fear
lighting_mood: Dim torchlight flickering on stone walls
